text: All IMFL shops in the district will remain closed on January 16 (Tiruvalluvar Day), January 24 (Thai Poosam marking the Vadalur Ramalingaswamigal Jyothi darshan) and January 26 (Republic Day). In a release issued here on Thursday, S. Palanisamy, District Collector, said that the licensed bars would remain closed.
title: Liquor shops to remain shut
